summary: The diff implements Stripe payment integration (REQ-1) and gold theme updates (REQ-8, REQ-9), but is missing implementations for enhanced AI chat (REQ-2), 3D games (REQ-3), AI art generation (REQ-4), music extensions (REQ-5), calculator (REQ-6), and translator expansion (REQ-7). No hallucinated features detected.

missing_requirements.requirement: Enhance the AI chat system to provide comprehensive, context-aware responses across all topics with improved understanding
missing_requirements.reason: While the diff mentions improved AI responses in comments (frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts), the actual implementation details are truncated and cannot be verified. No concrete evidence of enhanced chat capabilities visible in the provided diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add two new 3D games to the Built-in Games section using Three.js and React Three Fiber
missing_requirements.reason: PredefinedGameSelector shows two new games ('spaceshooter3d' and 'racing3d') added to the game list with Pro-only flags, but there is no evidence of actual Three.js/React Three Fiber implementations, game rendering code, or playable 3D game components in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement AI-powered art generation feature that creates images from text prompts in the Art section
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to ArtCanvas component visible in the diff. No text prompt input field, AI image generation logic, or art generation UI elements found.

missing_requirements.requirement: Extend music track duration capabilities and add voice recording functionality to the Music section
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to MusicGenerator component in the diff. No voice recording interface, audio recording controls, or extended duration functionality visible.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add standard calculator functionality with basic arithmetic operations to the Math problem solver
missing_requirements.reason: MathProblemSolver shows only homework helper and teacher mode toggle. No calculator interface, number pad, operation buttons, or calculator toggle functionality visible in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Expand Translator to support additional languages and integrate dictionary definitions for translated words
missing_requirements.reason: TranslatorChat component shows language selection dropdowns but no evidence of new languages added or dictionary lookup functionality. No dictionary results display or word definitions visible.
